notes: Balanced by USD. For each selected token drop, sample a USD value within amount_usd_range, apply lucky_bonus if it procs, then convert to units via amount = usd / token_values_usd[symbol]. Round with token_rounding if present. Equal odds for each token in tokens_pool. Harder heists can drop multiple distinct tokens. Failures lose points only.
